6#define TDS_ATTR(field_name) \
7 (sizeof(((STRUCTUREA*)0)->field_name) == sizeof(((STRUCTUREB*)0)->FIELDB field_name) && \
8 TDS_OFFSET(STRUCTUREA,field_name) == TDS_OFFSET(STRUCTUREB,FIELDB field_name))
